adHeader: Need an inexpensive, private ride to/from the airport? Try SocialDrv!
adDetails: We've always felt that getting a ride to/from the airport has been one of the biggest and most annoying hassles, ever! It's difficult, or inconvenient for family/friends to drop you, and transportation is way too expensive! So we decided to try and solve this long standing problem! Introducing SocialDrv, a brand new ride sharing startup aimed specifically at connecting people who need rides to/from the airport (SFO, OAK, SJC), with others in the community who can and want to provide them! Visit http://www.socialdrv.com for more information! Whether you're a passenger in need of a ride to the airport or someone who would like to offer a ride (make $24/hr!), try us out today! Book a reservation at http://www.socialdrv.com/passenger.html And be sure to sign up for our absolutely free frequent rider rewards program! http://www.socialdrv.com/frequent-rider-rewards.html
